lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Alex Rodriguez, who has a long-running feud with the Yankees, are appealing his 211-game suspension in a little-understood arbitration hearing in New York.
snippet: Lawyers for Alex Rodriguez, who has a long-running feud with the Yankees, are appealing his 211-game suspension in a little-understood arbitration hearing in New York.
